Name: Label
Description: A display label for the scale. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: NumberRange
Description: Indicates the high and low values (endpoints) of a numeric scale.

Name: Range
Description: Indicates the high and low values (endpoints) of a non-numeric scale.

Name: Anchor
Description: Allows for the attachment of a category label at any anchor point.

Name: MarkedIncrement
Description: Identifies the frequency for increment markers (with or without value attachments).

Name: ValueIncrement
Description: Identifies the frequency for value labels on marked or unmarked increments.

Name: DimensionNumber
Description: A number used to identify this dimension when describing its intersect point with one or more dimensions in the same scale representation. The dimension is denoted with a 1-based indexing. Dimension in the scale are numbered (1,2,n).

Name: DegreeSlopeFromHorizontal
Description: A horizontal line is described as a 0 (zero) slope. Expressed as the number of degrees positive (right end angle above the horizontal line) or degrees positive (right end descending below the horizontal line).
